name: Theodora_Ridgely
text:
Theodora Ridgely
Theodora Ridgely was a customer at Horne's Department Store.
Biography
In early March 1989, Ridgely attempted to buy a perfume from Audrey Horne, wishing for a "fruity" scent that would "make a statement." She soon became fed up with Audrey's attitude and left the perfume counter.
